title: Mocha Overnight Oats
directions: Add oats, cocoa powder, and chia seeds to a medium mason jar or air-tight container.
Add in bananas, honey and coffee.
Cover and shake until well combined.
Place in refrigerator overnight or for at least 6 hours.
Eat cold or heat up in the microwave for 1 minute.
ingredients: 1 tsp honey/maple syrup/ agave/other sweetener (or omit if you donâ€™t like too sweet)
